name: Ultimate Chaos Night
description:
This is reupload of one of my older games, infact it is the first game I ever made in Clickteamfusion 2.5 so its pretty bad
I did refine it a little bit before releasing but it still may be filled with bugs
Includes:

  • A whole array of animatronics ranging from FNAF 1-6
  • one very chaotic night
  • LOTS OF EASTER EGGS(click on things in the office and title screen)
  • a minigame
  • M E M E S

enjoy ;)

this game was originally on gamejolt, you can check out the gamejolt page here!

https://gamejolt.com/games/Chaos/411715
